step_data.thought:
I'm now on the Tax Rules page, which is part of the Stores section. Looking at the URL 'http://127.0.0.1:7780/admin/tax/rule/' and the page title 'Tax Rules / Taxes / Stores / Magento Admin', I can confirm I'm in the Taxes subsection of the Stores section.

The user's goal was to 'Navigate to the Stores section to configure store settings, payment methods, and taxes.' I've successfully navigated to the Stores section, specifically to the Tax Rules part which handles taxes configuration. This satisfies part of the user's goal related to taxes.

To continue fulfilling the user's goal, I should explore other parts of the Stores section, including store settings and payment methods. Looking at the navigation menu, I should click on the 'STORES' link again to see all available options in the Stores section. This will allow me to access store settings and payment methods configurations.
